Real Name: Peggy Carter
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE?: Captain Carter starts the game with the Disney+ #s005 Captain Carter's Shield equipped.

Comments
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
Looking at her from a Sealed perspective, I can't justify 115 points here, unless literally all nine other pieces I pulled are Billy Maximoff or Ravonna Renslayer or similar support-only pieces. You save 70 points going to her half-dial; that's a whole Scarlet Witch, or Vision, or Winter Soldier and Jimmy Woo together. An 18 with Toughness just isn’t enough armor for such a big chunk of the points your opponent is looking to score.
May 2, 2022
Goop
Not bad at all for a common, the shield +1 for the defend is really nice with her. She has solid values and good damage. I am concerned though with having just toughness top click for 115pts. She will likely get hit to her middle clicks that are also good but still i wish she had a little more defense at the top for her point value.
